title: PNB introduces Safety Ring mechanism to enhance security for internet, mobile banking users
description: Punjab National Bank (PNB) launched 'Safety Ring' within internet and mobile banking to counter cyber frauds. This optional feature allows daily limit settings for term deposits (TDs) to be closed or used for overdrafts, reducing losses from unauthorized access. PNB stated this ensures transactions exceeding set limits are blocked through digital channels, enhancing security.
